images.caption: Common Toadflax – plant with line-like leaves and aromatic, yellow flowers
Common Toadflax – flowers are arranged in terminal, dense, up to 50-flower racemes
Common Toadflax – sulphur-yellow flowers have a bright orange spot on the lower labium, and an up to 1 cm spur at their end
Common Toadflax – colorized drawing by Josef Dohnal
